document.heading: Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom Active Duty Pay Differential Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-135, the “Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom Active Duty Pay Differential Amendment Act of 2008”, which was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-121 which was referred to the Committee on Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008. Signed by the Mayor on February 5, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-286 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-135 became effective on March 26, 2008.
